p: The most effective concentration of the LQ in IBVs was tested by cytopathic effect (CPE). Three infection models were constructed. Before infection, 10 6 TCID 50 of virus was mixed with LQ and incubated at 37°C for 1 h ( pretreatment of virus, Pre-V); before infection, cells were treated with LQ for 1 h at 37°C ( pretreatment of cells, Pre-C). LQ was used to treat cells at 2 h after infection ( posttreatment of virus, Post-V). The supernatant was collected at 24 h postinfection, and the virus titers were determined in MDCK cells.
